sentences.en: "It's not one of my favourite forms of music." — "No."
sentences.cn: “这不是我喜欢的音乐形式。”——“对，这不是。”

sentences.en: "Silly little boy" was his favourite expression of rebuke to his pupils.
sentences.cn: “愚蠢的小家伙”是他最常用的斥责其学生的言辞。

sentences.en: a child’s favourite toy
sentences.cn: 孩子最喜欢的玩具

sentences.en: a favorite spot for picnickers
sentences.cn: 野餐者最喜欢的地方

sentences.en: Atlantic City is the hot favourite to stage the fight.
sentences.cn: 在大西洋城举行这场拳击比赛是众望所归。

sentences.en: By a curious twist of fate, cricket was also my favourite sport.
sentences.cn: 让人感到惊奇的是，板球碰巧也是我最喜欢的运动。

sentences.en: Essex's favourite son will open at Lord's to launch the cricket season.
sentences.cn: 艾塞克斯的骄子将在伦敦洛兹板球场为这一季的板球赛揭幕。

sentences.en: Everyone must be familiar with the old favourite among roses, Crystal Palace.
sentences.cn: 大家一定都很熟悉玫瑰中的老牌名品“水晶宫殿”。

sentences.en: He calls it a "contraption", using his favourite word of the moment.
sentences.cn: 他用了眼下他最喜欢说的“玩意儿”一词来称呼它。

sentences.en: He stared at his favourite child, dismayed, filled with fear.
sentences.cn: 他惊愕地盯着自己最宠爱的孩子，满心恐惧。

sentences.en: Her favourite subjects are shells spotted on beach walks.
sentences.cn: 她最喜爱的题材是那些在海边散步时发现的贝壳。

sentences.en: His favourite childhood pursuits were sailing, swimming and cycling.
sentences.cn: 儿时他最大的爱好是帆船运动、游泳和骑自行车。

sentences.en: Michael Fish is my favourite. He's a hoot, a real character.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢迈克尔·菲什。他滑稽逗趣，是个实实在在的人物。

sentences.en: Scent your drawers and wardrobe with your favourite aromas.
sentences.cn: 用你最喜欢的香味熏香你的抽屉和衣柜。

sentences.en: The Martell Cup Chase was won by the evens favourite Toby Tobias.
sentences.cn: 最被同额赌注赌家看好的托比·托拜厄斯赢得了马特尔杯追逐赛。

sentences.en: The Metropole is my favourite. I love those huge, anonymous hotels.
sentences.cn: 京都酒店是我最喜欢的酒店。我喜爱那些没名气的大酒店。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister is no favourite of the tabloids.
sentences.cn: 首相可不受小报的待见。

sentences.en: This is my favourite live album of all time.
sentences.cn: 这是我最喜爱的现场专辑。

sentences.en: What’s your favourite colour?
sentences.cn: 你最喜欢什么颜色？

sentences.en: You can sing along to your favourite Elvis hits.
sentences.cn: 你可以跟着一起唱你最喜爱的“猫王”的热门歌曲。
